## TextElement.renderOrder property

If specified, determines the render order between `TextElement`<!-- -->s. The number different renderOrders should be as small as possible, because every specific `renderOrder` may result in one or more draw calls.

TextElements with the same integer `renderOrder` will be rendered in the same batch.

The `renderOrder` of `TextElement`<!-- -->s are only relative to other `TextElement`<!-- -->s, and not other map elements.

A `TextElement` with a higher `renderOrder` will be rendered after a `TextElement` with a lower `renderOrder`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
renderOrder?: number;
```
